<% if(db_type == "mysql" || db_type == "postgresql"){ %>
select * from DMS_PZ_luXian order by ids asc limit ? offset ?
<% } else if(db_type == "oracle"){ %>
select * from ( select a.*, rownum rn from (select * from DMS_PZ_luXian) a where rownum < ? ) where rn >= ?
<% } else if(db_type == "sqlserver"){ %>
select top {0, number, #.#} * from DMS_PZ_luXian where ids not in ( select top {1, number, #.#} ids from DMS_PZ_luXian )
<% } else if(db_type == "db2"){ %>
select * from ( select b.*, rownumber() over() as rn from ( select * from DMS_PZ_luXian ) as b ) as a where a.rn < ? and a.rn >= ?
<% } %>
FROM DMS_LH_yangHuZhiFuShenQing day where 1=1 <% if(!(isEmpty(sdate))){ %> and day.startTime >= #'$sdate$'# <% } %> <% if(!(isEmpty(edate))){ %> and day.endTime <= #'$edate$'# <% } %>

from DMS_LH_yangHuZhiFuShenQing where 1=1 and state=0
<% if(!isEmpty(planMonth)){ %> and convert(varchar(7),planTime,120)= #'$planMonth$'# <% }%> <% if(!isEmpty(notInIds)){ %> and ids not in ('${notInIds}') <% } %>

SELECT d.ids, d.luXian, d.wzType, d.wzName, d.wzMiaoShu, d.startZHK, d.startZHM, d.endZHK, d.endZHM, d.content, d.fuZePeople, d.jiXieSheBei, d.remarks, d.planTime from DMS_LH_yangHuZhiFuShenQing d,DMS_LH_yangHuMonth m,DMS_LH_yangHuMonth_day_relate mdr where d.ids=mdr.dayIds and m.ids=mdr.monthIds and m.ids=?
